title: Senior Lead Developer Architect (Consultant via Mastech-Infotrellis) 50% Travel - Cloud - Retail

responsibilities.responsibilty: Coordination as Tech Lead between developers and testers to greenfield a Loyalty System (named Treats) to be based in the Microsoft Azure Cloud.
Architected .Net Core 2 C# restful api as an internal api with back end Azure SQL database processing.
Architected and implemented a system to seamlessly acquire JSON from either store procedures (Sql Server JSON) or as needed .Net Core Entity Framework.
Azure APIM management of four unique APIs with Policies (specific C# code) to handle JSON Web token (JWT) processing as needed and individual endpoint policies where required.

Publishing of API using Open API documentation (referred to as a swagger doc) methods (via Nuget SwashBuckle) in active Swagger document. Storing and defining swagger document in Swaggerhub using the system where there is a main generic Document to multiple APIs; creating multiple API endpoints to publish into Azure
